solution_line_template: First find the number of candles produced per hive: {total_candles_initial} candles / {num_hives_initial} hives = <<{total_candles_initial}/{num_hives_initial}={candles_per_hive}>>{candles_per_hive} candles/hive

Then divide the total number of candles by the number of candles per hive to find the number of hives: {target_candles} candles / {candles_per_hive} candles/hive = <<{target_candles}/{candles_per_hive}={hives_needed}>>{hives_needed} hives
